title: The Villainous Daughter’s Butler ~I Raised Her to be Very Cute~ - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Academy   Acting   Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Butlers   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Character Growth   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Childhood Promise   Clever Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Couple Growth   Cunning Protagonist   Cute Children   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   Discrimination   Fast Learner   First Love   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Honest Protagonist   Jack of All Trades   Jealousy   Leadership   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Love Triangles   Magic   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Mature Protagonist   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Otome Game   Persistent Love Interests   Politics   Popular Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Proactive Protagonist   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Selfless Protagonist   Student Council   Villainess Noble Girls   Yandere
author: Hiiro no Ame   Scarlet Rain   緋色の雨
description:
Regaining the memories of his previous life, Cyril realised that he was an otome game's character, the villainous daughter– Sophia's butler.

At the rate things were going, Sophia would eventually have the prince stolen away from her by the heroine, fall into darkness, and be executed.

Wanting to save the villainous daughter he was so fond of, Cyril moved to eliminate all the factors that would cause her to fall into darkness, raising her up to be a talented and beautiful girl who could win the prince's love, however...>
